QuestData.Title: Mr. Goldmine's Wild Ride
QuestData.Description: Okay, $n, we need to get to the earth portal at the back of the cave.$B$BI've "procured" a ride for us. Why walk when we can ride in style? I hope you don't mind mine carts.$B$BLet me know when you're ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the mine cart with Initiate Goldmine to the end of the line.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh no! My weapons and totems!$B$BThey're destroyed!!!

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Goldmine to get in the cart
